translations: n.[病理]溃疡，疡（ulcer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: He suffered from diabetes and gastric ulcers.
sentences.translation: 他患有糖尿病和胃溃疡。

sentences.sentence: In addition to headaches, you may develop stomach ulcers as well.
sentences.translation: 除了头痛，你还可能患上胃溃疡。

sentences.sentence: Ulcers occur when the stomach's natural acids eat into the lining of the stomach.
sentences.translation: 胃酸腐蚀胃壁时，就出现了溃疡。
